DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 study determine effect oral TR-701 FA SBP response administer tyramine
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 TR-701 FA Study Blood Pressure Response Post Tyramine Challenge
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 2-way crossover study determine effect 200 mg oral TR-701 FA SBP response administer tyramine healthy adult male female volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 45 year age , inclusive Body mass index 19 kg/m2 31 kg/m2 , inclusive Healthy subject clinically significant abnormality identify detailed medical history , Systolic blood pressure > 130 mmHg < 90 mmHg measure 10 minute supine position Screening admission study center Heart rate > 90 bpm < 45 bpm measure 10 minute supine position Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) find QTc interval > 500 msec , clinically significant ECG abnormality Screening Visit
